name: Pong Game (Chiew)
description:
A short pong game for a school project.

Using football concept to made this game, basically player has to prevent the balls hits your goal. Player are able to shoot mini ball to hits other player's goal too.

Player 1 : W to move up, S to move down, Q to shoot mini balls.

Player 2: "up arrow key" to move up, "down arrow key" to move down, "right arrow key" to shoot mini balls.
